finalized.description: toggle search of finalized folder ([{DEF}] by default)

staging.description: toggle search of staging (not yet finalized) folder ([{DEF}] by default)

unripe.description: toggle search of unripe (neither staged nor finalized) folder ([{DEF}] by default)

silent.description: lighten the reporting on progress (for use with --daemon switch to `chifra scrape`)

list.description: Index transactions for a given Ethereum address (or series of addresses).

version.description: display the current version of the tool

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

very_raw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename. (If the file exists, it will be overwritten. If 'fn' ends with .gz, the resulting file will be zipped )

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

addrs.description: one or more addresses (0x...) to export

receipts.description: export receipts instead of transaction list

logs.description: export logs instead of transaction list

traces.description: export traces instead of transaction list

balances.description: export balance history instead of transaction list

hashes_only.description: export the IPFS hashes of the index chunks the address appears in

count_only.description: display only the count of the number of data items requested

articulate.description: articulate transactions, traces, logs, and outputs

write_txs.description: write transactions to the cache (see notes)

write_traces.description: write traces to the cache (see notes)

skip_ddos.description: toggle skipping over 2016 dDos transactions ([{DEF}] by default)

max_traces.description: if --skip_ddos is on, this many traces defines what a ddos transaction is (default = [{DEF}])

all_abis.description: load all previously cached abi files

grab_abis.description: using each trace's 'to' address, grab the abi for that address (improves articulation)

freshen.description: freshen but do not print the exported data

deltas.description: for --balances option only, export only changes in balances

occurrence.description: for each loaded list of appearances, export only this occurrence

emitter.description: available for --logs option only, export will only export if the address emitted the event

export.description: Export full detail of transactions for one or more Ethereum addresses.

version.description: display the current version of the tool

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

very_raw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename. (If the file exists, it will be overwritten. If 'fn' ends with .gz, the resulting file will be zipped )

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

n_blocks.description: maximum number of blocks to process (defaults to 5000)

n_block_procs.description: number of block channels for blaze

n_addr_procs.description: number of address channels for blaze

scrape.description: Decentralized blockchain scraper and block cache.

very_raw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

modes.description: the type of status info to retrieve

details.description: include details about items found in monitors, slurps, abis, or price caches

types.description: for cache mode only, which type(s) of cache to report

depth.description: for cache mode only, number of levels deep to report

heatmap.description: for cache mode only, return a heatmap of the given (single) cache

list.description: display results in Linux ls -l format (assumes --detail)

report.description: show a summary of the current status of the blockchain and TrueBlocks scrapers

get_config.description: returns JSON data of the editable configuration file items

set_config.description: accepts JSON in an env variable and writes it to configuration files

status.description: Report on status of one or more TrueBlocks caches.

seed.description: seed the address index to IPFS

version.description: display the current version of the tool

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

very_raw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename. (If the file exists, it will be overwritten. If 'fn' ends with .gz, the resulting file will be zipped )

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

sleep.description: for the 'scrape' and 'daemon' commands, the number of seconds chifra should sleep between runs (default [{DEF}])

set.description: for 'settings' only, indicates that this is a --set

files.description: path(s) of files to check, merge, fix or display (default=display)

check.description: check for duplicates and other problems in the cache

data.description: in 'list' mode, render results as data (i.e export mode)

sort.description: sort the list of transactions and re-write (precludes other modes, other than --dedup)

fix.description: remove duplicates from the cache (if any)

list.description: list the contents of the cache (the default if no other option)

import.description: import transactions if import.txt file exists in current folder

remove.description: remove transactions if remove.txt file exists in current folder

truncate.description: truncate the cache at block :n (keeps block 'n' and before, implies --fix)

merge.description: merge two or more caches into a single cache

run.description: run the class maker on associated <class_name(s)>

edit.description: edit <class_name(s)> definition file in local folder

all.description: list, or run all class definitions found in the local folder

js.description: export javaScript code from the class definition

options.description: export options code (check validity in the process)

format.description: format source code files (.cpp and .h) found in local folder and below

lint.description: lint source code files (.cpp and .h) found in local folder and below

dump.description: dump any classDefinition config tomls to screen and quit

nspace.description: surround generated c++ code with a namespace

filter.description: process only files whose filename or contents contain 'filter'

test.description: for both code generation and options generation, process but do not write changes

force.description: for both code generation and options generation, force writing of changes

ERR_EMPTYJSFILE.description: Cannot export javscript for an empty class. Quitting...

ERR_CHOOSEONE.description: Please chose exactly one of --run, --list, or --edit. Quitting...

ERR_NOFILTERMATCH.description: No definitions found that matched the filter: [{FILTER}]. Quitting...

ERR_NEEDONECLASS.description: Please specify at least one className. Quitting...

mode.description: determine which set of tests to run

clean.description: clean working folder before running tests

no_quit.description: do not quit testing on first error

no_post.description: do not complete the post processing step

feed.description: the feed for the price data

addrs.description: one or more addresses to slurp from Etherscan

blocks.description: an optional range of blocks to slurp

types.description: one or more types of transactions to request

appearances.description: show only the blocknumer.tx_id appearances of the exported transactions

slurp.description: Fetches data from EtherScan for an arbitrary address.

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

terms.description: a space separated list of one or more search terms

expand.description: expand search to include all fields (default searches name, address, and symbol only)

owned.description: include personal accounts in the search

named.description: include well know token and airdrop addresses in the search

addr.description: display only addresses in the results (useful for scripting)

add.description: add a new record to the name database (format: grp+subgrp+addr+name+sym+src+desc)

tags.description: export the list of tags and subtags only

names.description: Query addresses and/or names of well known accounts.

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

blocks.description: a space-separated list of one or more blocks to retrieve

hashes_only.description: display only transaction hashes, default is to display full transaction detail

addrs.description: display all addresses included in the block

uniq.description: display only uniq addresses found per block

uniq_tx.description: display only uniq addresses found per transaction

count_only.description: display counts of appearances (for --addrs, --uniq, or --uniq_tx only)

force.description: force a re-write of the block to the cache

blocks.description: Returns block(s) from local cache or directly from a running node.

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

blocks.description: a space-separated list of one or more blocks for which to retrieve blooms

eab.description: pull the enhanced adaptive blooms from QBlocks cache

block_only.description: show only the block-level bloom (--raw only)

receipt_only.description: show only the receipt-level blooms (--raw only)

bits.description: display blooms as bits instead of hex

bars.description: display blooms as bar chart instead of hex

bitbars.description: display nBits as a bar chart

pctbars.description: display nBits as a percentage of bloom space

bitcount.description: display the number of bits lit per bloom

force.description: force a re-write of the bloom to the cache

blooms.description: Returns bloom filter(s) from running node (the default) or as EAB from QBlocks.

parts.description: one or more parts of the token information to retreive
